item.title: 29-Year-Old Software Engineer With $135,000 Salary Plans To Retire By 35, Says He's In Top 0.1% Of Most Frugal People
SpaceX's workhorse rockets are grounded. Here's why.
item.description: A rare mishap for SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket on July 11 has ground the company's workhorse launch vehicle to a halt while an investigation is underway.

item.title: Proposed new law would make it illegal to remove AI watermarks from content
item.description: Introduced by a bipartisan group of Senators, the new COPIED Act sets standards for watermarking, content authentication, and media use amid concerns about non-consensual AI training.

item.title: Study of AI as a creative writing helper finds that it works, but there's a catch
item.description: An experiment analyzing ChatGPT's effect on creative writing showed individuals benefitted from the tool, but the collective may suffer.
